items.sentence: All the letters I received from Tom were in French.
Tom looked out the window to see what was going on.
Tom suspects Mary is the one who stole his bicycle.
Tom wanted the barber to cut his hair really short.
Tom couldn\'t remember how to get to Mary\'s house.
Tom couldn\'t understand why Mary didn\'t like him.
Tom couldn\'t wait to see the look on Mary\'s face.
I suspect Tom and Mary both have to leave tomorrow.
I think we should ask Tom why he left his last job.
I thought you might want Tom to play golf with you.
Tom was walking towards the station when I saw him.
Tom was wearing a black T-shirt and designer jeans.
Tom was whistling a song his mother had taught him.
Tom washes his face every morning before breakfast.
It looks like the thief came in through the window.
Tom fell asleep as soon as his head hit the pillow.
Tom fell asleep at the wheel and hit a street lamp.
Tom fell asleep the moment his head hit the pillow.
Tom told Mary to listen carefully, but she didn\'t.
I don\'t think I could ever get used to this smell.
